objects.text:
• Premium Quality Formula
• Long-Lasting Bubbles
• Non-Toxic & Safe
• Giant 4 Liter Size

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant and eye-catching banner is designed to promote a children's bubble solution product. The layout is divided into four colorful quadrants: sky blue (top left), leafy green (top right), vivid purple (bottom left), and sunny yellow (bottom right). Positioned prominently at the top left, the “heading” text uses a bold and fun font, while the “subheading” just below reinforces the product concept. The "description" text in the bottom left lists the product benefits using bullet points. The “price” text stands out in bold white just above a yellow rounded "cta_button" element, which includes a bold “BUY NOW” label (“cta” text). The center-right features a high-resolution “product_image” of the bubble solution bottle. Bubbles scattered in the background across the quadrants enhance the playful theme.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: #81D4FA
- Green: #4CAF50 (with opacity)
- Purple: #8E24AA
- Yellow: #FFC107
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The Gazillion Bubbles product image showcases a vibrant, playful color palette perfect for a fun advertisement banner. The primary colors are neon green (#7AF262) from the bubble solution, deep purple (#792BA4) used in the cap and label background, and bright yellow (#FFD400) for the word “BUBBLES.” Accents include bubble hues like light blue (#AEE1F9) and lavender (#D1A8F7), enhancing a whimsical, light-hearted feel. These colors are blended harmoniously, creating contrast and ensuring the brand name pops with a yellow-orange outline (#F78F1E). The balance of warm and cool tones adds to the dynamic energy, making it perfect for a children-focused product.
